import { FC, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import './CurrencyExchange.css' export const CurrencyExchange: FC = () => { const [state, setState] = useState('') let total = 0 const [value, setValue] = useState('') const int = parseInt(state) console.log(int, value) console.log(total, state) const currentValue = localStorage.getItem('currency') const navigate = useNavigate() const goBack = () => navigate('/', { replace: true }) useEffect(() => { setValue(currentValue || '') }, [currentValue]) return (
Go back
<> setState(e.target.value)} />
You'll can get in UAH: {value === 'UAH' ? (parseInt(state) * 1).toFixed(2) : value === 'EUR' ? (parseInt(state) * 35.797).toFixed(2) : value === 'USD' ? (parseInt(state) * 36.5686).toFixed(2) : value === 'CAD' ? (parseInt(state) * 26.6477).toFixed(2) : value === 'AED' ? (parseInt(state) * 9.9558).toFixed(2) : isNaN(value) ? 0 : total}
) }
